She walks over to you and you try to talk but you cant talk either. She picks you up and walks to the mirror. You see her holding a pair of frilly pink panties. But your not in the mirror. She says hey Matt hows the view. You then realize you are that pair of panties. She says you never shouldve cheated on her and this is her revenge she told you how shes a witch and your hers for life. She then puts you on and put on a tight pair of pants then continued with her morning schedule.
